Newsbrief: Slot machine rogue-lite, CloverPit, has sold 500,000 copies in eight days. 

Developer Panik Arcade shared the news on Bluesky and said the title set a new Steam concurrent player record over the weekend. According to the latest estimates from SteamDB, the game delivered an all-time peak of 25,190 concurrent players on October 5. 

CloverPit is currently only available on Steam, which is a point Panik Arcade has emphasized on social media after a "barely playable" mobile clone materialized on the iOS App Store.
